get.summary: List all appointments for a customer
get.description: Returns a paginated list of appointments for a specific customer with optional filtering by date range, status, and series inclusion.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Filter appointments starting from this date/time

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Filter appointments up to this date/time

parameters.name: include_series
parameters.description: Include series data with weekday slots

post.description: Creates a new appointment for a customer. Returns 409 if the time slot conflicts with an existing appointment.

message.example: Conflito de horário: já existe uma marcação nesse intervalo.

get.description: Returns details of a specific appointment for a customer.

delete.description: Performs a soft delete on the appointment (sets deleted_at timestamp).

patch.description: Updates an existing appointment. Returns 409 if the updated time conflicts with another appointment. All fields are optional for partial updates.

message.example: Conflito de horário: já existe uma marcação nesse intervalo.

get.summary: List all appointment series for a customer
get.description: Returns a list of recurring appointment series for a specific customer with optional filtering by status and weekday slot inclusion.

parameters.name: include_weekdays
parameters.description: Include weekday time slots in the response

post.description: Creates a new recurring appointment series with weekday time slots. Optionally generates individual appointment occurrences immediately. Returns 409 if generated appointments conflict with existing ones.

parameters.name: generate
parameters.description: Whether to generate appointment occurrences immediately

parameters.name: weeks
parameters.description: Number of weeks to generate occurrences for (only used if generate=true)

notes.example: Recurring meeting every Monday and Wednesday

ends_on.description: End date for the series (null means no end)

409.description: Conflict - Generated occurrences overlap with existing appointments

message.example: Conflito de horário: a série gerou ocorrências que colidem com marcações existentes.

get.description: Returns details of a specific appointment series including weekday time slots.

404.description: Customer or series not found, or series does not belong to customer

put.description: Updates an existing appointment series. Supports partial updates. Can replace weekday slots if provided. Optionally regenerates future appointment occurrences.

parameters.name: regenerate
parameters.description: Whether to delete future occurrences and regenerate them based on updated configuration

parameters.name: weeks
parameters.description: Number of weeks to generate occurrences for (only used if regenerate=true)

ends_on.description: End date for the series (null means no end)

weekdays.description: Array of weekday time slots to replace existing slots (0=Sunday, 6=Saturday)

404.description: Customer or series not found, or series does not belong to customer

409.description: Conflict - Regenerated occurrences overlap with existing appointments

message.example: Conflito de horário: a atualização gerou ocorrências que colidem com marcações existentes.

delete.description: Deactivates an appointment series by setting is_active=false. Optionally deletes all future appointment occurrences created from this series.

parameters.name: delete_future
parameters.description: Whether to soft delete all future appointment occurrences created from this series

404.description: Customer or series not found, or series does not belong to customer

get.description: Returns a paginated list of active customers with optional name search filter

parameters.name: search
parameters.description: Filter customers by name (case-insensitive partial match)

post.description: Creates a new customer. If a soft deleted customer with the same email exists, it will be reactivated and updated.

delete.description: Performs a soft delete on the customer (sets deleted_at timestamp).

patch.description: Updates a customer. All fields are optional (partial update supported).

post.description: Reactivates a soft deleted customer by removing the deleted_at timestamp.

delete.description: Permanently removes the customer from the database (cannot be undone).

series.description: Included only when requested via include_series parameter

weekdays.description: Weekday time slots for this series
